pimalaya/himalaya

Manage your emails from the terminal with Himalaya, an open source Rust CLI that supports multiple accounts, IMAP, SMTP, and PGP encryption

View on index

Related repos

  • Self-hosted email middleware for IMAP, SMTP, and Gmail API
  • archive, search, and export emails from multiple accounts with user management and retention policies
  • webmail client that combines all your email accounts in one place
  • Email client for managing multiple accounts, unified inbox, advanced search, and translation
  • Tutanota is an open-source email service with end-to-end encryption for emails, calendars, and contacts, offering secure communication and encrypted storage
